product_families.family_name: Polythene Insulated Jelly Filled (PIJF) Armoured Copper Telecom Cables
product_families.high_level_description: Single-strand, polythene insulated, jelly-filled, and armoured copper cables designed for telecommunications applications, emphasizing resistance to moisture and mechanical protection.

variant_specific_constraints: Diameter over sheath shall not exceed 37.5mm (TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Table-7)
Minimum sheath thickness: 1.62 mm (min) and 2.2 mm (nom) for 200P cable
Diameter over Jacket shall not exceed 45.5mm for 200P cable

variant_specific_dimensions_or_limits.packing_length: 1000 meters +/- 10% or as per TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Table-1

variant_specific_constraints: Diameter over sheath shall not exceed 28mm (TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Table-7)
Minimum sheath thickness: 1.50 mm (min) and 2.0 mm (nom) for 100P cable
Diameter over Jacket shall not exceed 36mm for 100P cable

variant_specific_dimensions_or_limits.packing_length: 1000 meters +/- 10% or as per TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Table-1

variant_specific_constraints: Diameter over sheath shall not exceed 22mm (TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Table-7)
Minimum sheath thickness: 1.50 mm (min) and 2.0 mm (nom) for 50P cable
Diameter over Jacket shall not exceed 29mm for 50P cable

variant_specific_dimensions_or_limits.packing_length: 1000 meters +/- 10% or as per TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Table-1

variant_specific_constraints: Diameter over sheath shall not exceed 17mm (TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Table-7)
Minimum sheath thickness: 1.50 mm (min) and 2.0 mm (nom) for 20P cable
Diameter over Jacket shall not exceed 24mm for 20P cable

variant_specific_dimensions_or_limits.packing_length: 1000 meters +/- 10% or as per TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Table-1

variant_specific_constraints: Diameter over sheath shall not exceed 11mm (TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Table-7)
Minimum sheath thickness: 1.50 mm (min) and 2.0 mm (nom) for 10P cable
Diameter over Jacket shall not exceed 20.2mm for 10P cable

variant_specific_dimensions_or_limits.packing_length: 1000 meters +/- 10% or as per TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Table-1

common_technical_characteristics.conductor: Solid Annealed high conductive Copper, 0.5mm diameter, single strand
common_technical_characteristics.insulation: Polythene insulating grade; Solid polythene conforming to ASTMD-1248 Type-II or III, Class-A cat.4 or 5; Uniform thickness for entire cable length
common_technical_characteristics.sheath: Inner sheath: Polythene grade with anti-oxidant conforming to BS 6234. Outer Jacket: Solid polythene conforming to BS-6234
special_properties: Jelly Filling Compound: Petroleum Jelly, homogenous, uniformly mixed, anti-oxidant, water-resistant, compatible with polythene insulation, binders and tapes
Core Wrapping: Closed helical or longitudinal lapping of a non-hygroscopic and non-wicking polyester tape, impregnated or flooded with jelly
Moisture barrier/Screen: Polythene coated aluminum tape, 0.3 mm+ 15% thickness, minimum overlap of 3 mm
Bedding tape: Polythene tape or polypropylene tape, applied helically over the sheath
Colour coding: As per Table 2 of TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Aug 2003
Twisting/Pairing Lay length: Shall not exceed 150mm

mandatory_standards: ASTMD-1248 Type-II or III, Class-A cat.4 or 5
non_negotiable_constraints: Conductor diameter: 0.5mm
Armouring thickness: 0.5mm ±10%
Jacket thickness: Shall not be less than 1.4mm
Cable wound on strong wooden drums for packing
Ends of cable sealed by rubber or PVC caps
Hot stamping with SDSC SHAR stamp at cable ends required
Sequential length marking at 1-meter intervals throughout the sheath is critical
Conductor resistance: 86 Ohms/km ± 6 Ohms/km
Resistance unbalance: 1 (average) / 2.5 (individual)
Mutual capacitance: 52 ± 3 nF/km at 800 to 1000 Hz
Capacitance unbalance (Pair to Pair): ≤ 50 pF/Km (average) @800- 1000Hz
Capacitance unbalance (Pair to Gnd): ≤ 750 pF/Km (average) @800- 1000Hz
Dielectric strength (conductors): 2.4 KV DC for 3 Sec.
Dielectric strength (conductors to shield): 5.0 KV DC for 3 Sec.
Insulation resistance (C-C & C-S): Min 5000 MΩ-KM at 500 V DC-1 Min
Dielectric strength of sheath: 17KV DC or 11KV RMS AC for sheath thickness 2.0 to 2.4mm
Equal level far end cross talk (150KHz): Better than 55dB/Km (individual)
Near end cross talk (150KHz): Better than 55dB/Km (individual)
Attenuation (150KHz): 8.25 dB/Km (maximum average) at 20 deg C

electrical_tests: Dielectric strength (High voltage) between all conductors and shield
Equal level far end cross talk (150KHz)
mechanical_tests: Variation between the maximum and minimum diameter over sheath at any cross section
Elongation and tensile strength of conductor insulation
Annealing of conductor (Min 15% of a sample wire of 250mm long)
testing_and_quality_expectations.inspection_requirements: Inspection at factory site/online video mode before dispatch. Dispatch requires clearance from SDSC SHAR Pre-Delivery inspection team. Minimum 50% of ordered quantity to be tested with SDSC SHAR authorities present, using randomly chosen cable drums.

engineering_complexity_indicators: Strict adherence to TEC GR standard for numerous parameters including material composition, dimensional tolerances, and electrical performance.
Critical sequential running length marking for traceability.
Complex multi-layer construction including jelly filling, core wrapping, moisture barrier, and double armouring.
Extensive electrical and mechanical test matrix required for validation.
validation_required_before_commitment: Pre-Delivery Inspection by SDSC SHAR team.
Minimum 50% of ordered quantity to be tested in presence of SDSC SHAR authorities.

product_families.family_name: Armoured Fire Retardant Low Smoke (FRLS) Copper Telephone Cables
product_families.high_level_description: Single-strand, armoured copper telephone cable with Fire Retardant Low Smoke (FRLS) properties for enhanced safety in critical environments.

variant_specific_constraints: Packing cable length: 500m ± 10% in a single drum/reel or nominal length specified in TEC GR WIR 06/03. March 2002.

common_technical_characteristics.conductor: Solid annealed Bare copper conductor as per IS:8130 (Single strand), Electrolytic Grade, 0.5mm diameter
common_technical_characteristics.armouring: Galvanized steel Round wire (IS: 3975), Single layer, ≥ 0.9 mm size
common_technical_characteristics.sheath: Inner sheath material: PVC type ‘TM-2 as per IS:13176 or ST1 as per IS:5831’. Outer Sheath material: Extruded FRLS PVC type- TM-2 as per IS:13176 or ST1 as per IS:5831’
special_properties: Colour coding: As per Table-2 of GR/WIR 06/03. Mar 2002
Outer sheath must exhibit Fire Retardant Low Smoke (FRLS) properties

non_negotiable_constraints: Conductor diameter: 0.5mm
Lay length of Twisted pair: ≤ 80mm
Armouring: Single layer Galvanized steel Round wire, ≥ 0.9 mm size
Inner sheath thickness: Minimum 0.65mm
Outer Sheath thickness: Minimum 1.24mm
Flammability test: Must pass as per IEC-332 Part-1
Smoke density rating: Max 60% when tested as per ASTM D2843
Conductor Resistance: 86 ± 6 ohms/km
Min Insulation resistance: 50M.ohms/km
High Voltage test: 2KV RMS for 1 minute
Capacitance Unbalance (pair to pair): Shall not exceed 230PF

fire_or_environmental_tests: Smoke density rating (as per ASTM D2843)
testing_and_quality_expectations.inspection_requirements: Inspection at factory site/online video mode before dispatch. Dispatch requires clearance from SDSC SHAR Pre-Delivery inspection team. Minimum 50% of ordered quantity to be tested with SDSC SHAR authorities present, using randomly chosen cable drums.

engineering_complexity_indicators: Compliance with multiple Indian Standards (IS) and international fire safety standards (IEC, ASTM).
Requirement for FRLS outer sheath material, demanding specialized formulation and processing to meet flammability and smoke density ratings.
Precise control over cable dimensions, particularly the overall diameter and sheath thicknesses.
validation_required_before_commitment: Pre-Delivery Inspection by SDSC SHAR team.
Minimum 50% of ordered quantity to be tested in presence of SDSC SHAR authorities.
